Posted By: Foundry (12/18/2010 10:21:24 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@Omenchild  
  
While I would not say that an extra ability like [Firebreathing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Firebreathing) would make this card worse, it would be one of the least synergistic of the common abilities. You couldnt really firebreath untill his second turn attacking, as all your mana is tied up in echo.
